articles.title: About 4-in-10 Americans say Trump is a ‘terrible’ president amid sinking approval: Survey - The Hill
articles.description: A new poll shows that about 4 in 10 Americans say President Trump has been a “terrible” leader in his second term. The Associated Press-NORC Center for Public Affairs Research also found that about 2 in 10 think he has done an average job in his presidency an…

articles.title: Virginia Giuffre, plaintiff in Epstein and Prince Andrew sex trafficking case, dies at 41 - PBS
articles.description: The American-born Giuffre, who lived in Australia for years, became an advocate for sex trafficking survivors after emerging as a central figure in Epstein's prolonged downfall.

articles.title: More Americans are financing groceries with buy now, pay later loans — and more are paying those bills late, survey says - CNBC
articles.description: Consumers are using buy now, pay later plans to pay for essentials such as groceries, as concerns around the economy grow.
articles.content:
A growing number of Americans are using buy now, pay later loans to buy groceries, and more people are paying those bills late, according to new Lending Tree data released Friday.
